text: Pashtunistan (, Pax̌tūnistān or Pukhtunistan, meaning the "land of Pashtuns"Various spellings result from different pronunciation in various Pashto dialects. See Pashto language: Dialects for further information.) means the region where the indigenous Pashtun people of modern-day Afghanistan and Pakistan lived. ==References== Category:Politics of Afghanistan
title: Pashtunistan
